name: Vourukasha's Glow
description: After this character takes DMG: If the character to which this is attached is the active character, then draw 1 card. During this End Phase, heal the attached character for 1 HP. (Once per Round)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After this character takes DMG:</color> If the character to which this is attached is the active character, then draw 1 card. During this End Phase, heal the attached character for 1 HP. (Once per Round)
